name: Paris Métro Simulator
description:
Paris Métro Simulator is a subway simulator.
You must respect the red lights, the speed limit and stop at the end of each station.
You will cross the Seine with a fantastic view on the Tour Eiffel and retrieve the atmosphere of the Parisian subway system. Improve your score by embarking as many passengers as you can and arriving at the next station on time.

Online free demo version at http://parismetrosimulator.appspot.com/
